name: INTL FCSTONE LTD
goal:
Business sector of the organisation is provision of brokerage and general financial services including but not limited to the development and provision of hedging and risk management tools currently for the commodities, foreign exchange, precious metal and payment services sectors, respectively.
The aim of the organisation for this registration to keep more closely abreast and where possible influence policy of the Commission specifically in the sectors described above and those affecting financial services as a whole.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Markets in Financial Instruments Directive
Market Abuse Directive
Payment Services Directive
Financial Services sector
employment and immigration
